endpoints.description: Retrieve the current operational status for a specific equipment unit by its ID.
Assign a specific task or operation to the equipment referenced by the given ID.
Fetch the overall daily production metrics for the mining site.
Access the upcoming maintenance schedule for all equipment.
Set up a new alert for specific equipment or operational metrics.
List all available materials in storage along with their quantities.
Log the results of an inspection for a specific equipment or location.
Retrieve metrics related to the site's power consumption.
Delete a previously created alert specified by its unique ID.
Add a new schedule for training sessions for the operations team.
